creator: MisterM
title: EL Wire Cassette Tape Dangler
description: This project creates a glowing cassette tape pendant using EL wire. The EL wire is routed inside the cassette tape casing to give the appearance of glowing magnetic tape, providing a retro aesthetic.
steps: Dismantle the cassette tape and discard the magnetic tape.
Decide where the power lead will enter the cassette body and cut a hole for the power cable.
Glue one of the reels to the cassette body.
Start wrapping the EL wire around the glued reel, securing it with glue bit by bit.

Route the EL wire through the cassette body to the other reel, cutting small bites out of the cassette body with a rotary cutting tool to accommodate the wire's thickness, ensuring both halves can close.
Stick the wire to the second reel outside the cassette body, winding and sticking bit by bit until all the EL wire is used.
Place the completed reel of EL wire inside the cassette body and reassemble the cassette.
